function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Differential effectiveness of methods based on building type","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficiency of type 3 methods in low and medium-risk buildings","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Interaction effect of method and structure is not significant","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sphericity test not meeting significance level","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incorrect interpretation of test results for effects within the subjects","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Different coping methods may have varying effects in different types of buildings","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Observed covariance matrices are not equal between different construction groups","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Significance and non-significance of multivariate tests can influence the interpretation of the study results","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The proportion of participants is significantly higher in continental europe","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The measures in design and construction have the highest score in all three types of buildings","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The studied methods have the highest scores in high and very high-risk buildings","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Examination of the effect of implementing prevention methods on different types of buildings may lead to the spread of contagious diseases if the methods are not effective or if the buildings are not properly managed.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate or biased demographic analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty of the population size of the study","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Random sampling selection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Difficulty of collecting information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of proper training and guidance on covid-19 exposure sources and prevention measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible lack of effective preventive measures in the real estate industry","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on outdated prevention and control methods","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of risk assessment and management in building services maintenance","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of systemic study on covid-19 response in the built environment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient knowledge and guidance on combating covid-19 in facilities management","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission route through stool viral shedding","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of exposure to sars-cov-2 due to work-related hazards","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in covid-19 risk levels","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data collection and analysis during the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge about technical responses to infections in workplaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in health and safety risks based on work environment outdoors vs. enclosed","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interdependent relation between health and the built environment in controlling covid-19 spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unknown factors in the management of covid-19 pandemic and its impact on property management","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emergence of epidemic diseases impacting sustainable development","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 impacting the construction industry","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Model 1 not adjusted for employment status in models estimating sickness benefit transfers","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Model 2 not adjusted for chronic conditions, any psychiatric condition, and physical activity","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of diagnosis related groups charges and outpatient charges for unit cost estimates may not accurately capture the full cost of treatment.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on market price for prescription medicines may not reflect the actual cost incurred by the healthcare system.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Analysis of sickness benefit transfers may not fully represent the economic impact of long-term sickness absence.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Possible underestimation of the impact of long-term sick leave on productivity and economic costs","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conservative estimation of the cost reductions associated with flourishing over the short-term, without considering long-term flourishing","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need to disclose potential conflicts of interest and financial relationships related to the submitted work","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Missing data on alcohol consumption, smoking, and nutrition could lead to unadjusted factors and potential mediators in the analysis.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Flourishing assessment based on a specific conceptualization of flourishing, potentially excluding other important components such as character and virtue.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible overadjustment in the analytical models by accounting for past healthcare utilization and health status, leading to biased results.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Statistical uncertainty related to selection bias","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of generalizability to other countries","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low response rate to the survey","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequalities in response rates based on gender, age, education, marital status, employment, immigration status, and income","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The interplay between individual, community, and societal factors in promoting mental health and well-being","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in flourishing prevalence contributing to escalating healthcare expenditure.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of focus on promoting mental health and well-being.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
